| HistoryText             = '''Batroc's Brigade''' is a team of mercenaries organized and led by [[Georges Batroc (Earth-616)|Batroc the Leaper]]. Although Batroc can and has operated on many occasions as a solo mercenary, he frequently employs a "Brigade" contingent upon his assignment. Most commonly, the Brigade is formed by only two additional costumed mercenaries, always with Batroc as the leader.

===First Batroc's Brigade:===
The first Brigade was formed when Batroc was hired by an unknown person to steal an object called the "seismo-bomb". Batroc, considering the task beyond his personal skills, hired two more mercenaries, but they were defeated by Captain America and the mission was a failure.

*[[Georges Batroc (Earth-616)|Batroc the Leaper]] - (Georges Batroc)
*[[Arthur Parks (Earth-616)|Living Laser]] - (Arthur Parks)
*[[Jacques Duquesne (Earth-616)|Swordsman]] - (Jacques Duquesne)

===Second Batroc's Brigade===
Batroc formed a new Brigade when he was hired by [[Wolfgang von Strucker (Android) (Earth-616)|The Hood]]. The Hood wanted Batroc and other mercenaries to attack Captain America, but they were again defeated. The Second Brigade included:

*[[Georges Batroc (Earth-616)|Batroc the Leaper]] - (Georges Batroc)
*[[Alexander Gentry (Earth-616)|Porcupine]] - (Alexander Gentry)
*[[David Cannon (Earth-616)|Whirlwind]] - (David Cannon)

===Third Brigade===

[[File:Batroc's Brigade, Daniel Rand, Georges Batroc (Earth-616) from Marvel Premiere Vol 1 20.jpg|thumb|Third Brigade]]For a time, Batroc composed "brigades" with various common thugs. None of them had superhuman powers, advanced technology or a costume{{r|Marvel Premiere #20}}.

===Fourth Brigade===

Batroc formed a last brigade with other two mercenaries to try and steal [[Captain America's Shield|Captain America's shield]], but that mission also failed. This brigade included:

*[[Georges Batroc (Earth-616)|Batroc the Leaper]] - (Georges Batroc)
*[[Ferdinand Lopez (Earth-616)|Machete]]  - (Ferdinand Lopez) - (deceased)
*[[Maximillian Zaran (Earth-616)|Zaran]] - (Maximillian Zaran)

While the original Machete has since perished and been replaced by his brother (who ALSO perished and was replaced by a third brother), this incarnation has been active the longest, carrying out various mercenary missions.

*[[Alfonso Lopez (Earth-616)|Machete (Alfonso Lopez)]] - (Alfonso Lopez) - (deceased)
*[[Mariano Lopez (Earth-616)|Machete (Mariano Lopez)]] - (Mariano Lopez)

Most recently [[Roussel Dupont (Earth-616)|Rapido]] and a female [[Machete (Female) (Earth-616)|Machete]] have joined the brigade. {{r|Captain America and Iron Man Vol 1 633}}
